1 #!/usr/bin/python3
2 import traceback
3 from attr import dataclass
4 import torch
5 import rospy
6 import os
7 from geometry_msgs.msg import Pose2D
8 from sensor_msgs.msg import Image, CameraInfo
9 import numpy as np
10 
11 
12 from ros_crop_estimation.msg import ObjectDetected, ObjectsInImg
13 from vision_msgs.msg import BoundingBox2D
14 
15 
16 import logging
17 import sys
18 import PIL.Image
19 import message_filters
20 import pyrealsense2
21 
22 
23 logging.basicConfig(filename='YoloObjectLocator.log', level=logging.DEBUG,
24  filemode='w', format='%(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s')

26 
27 class ObjectDetector:
28  """
29  The ObjectDetector publishes the detected poses of grape-bunches in the image frame.
30  This is done by subscribing to the robot's camera and extracting grape-bunch image positions from the image.
31  This implementation features yolov5!
32  """
33 
34  det_pub = None
35  img_sub = None
36  detected_positions = None
37  detector_model = None
38  cv_bridge = None
39 
40  def __init__(self,
41  model_repo_or_dir='ultralytics/yolov5',
42  model_name=['custom', '../models/yolov5/best.pt'],
43  pub_name="/object_detector/object_detected"):
44  rospy.init_node("image_object_detector", log_level=rospy.DEBUG)
45 
46  rospy.loginfo("model_repo_or_dir: " + str(model_repo_or_dir))
47  model_repo_or_dir = rospy.get_param("~model_repo_or_dir", model_name)
48  rospy.loginfo("model_repo_or_dir: " + str(model_repo_or_dir))
49  model_name = rospy.get_param("~model_name", model_name)
50  img_color_top = rospy.get_param("~color_img_topic")
51  img_depth_top = rospy.get_param("~depth_img_topic")
52  camera_info_top = rospy.get_param("~camera_info_topic")
53 
54  try:
55  self.detector_model = torch.hub.load(model_repo_or_dir, *model_name)
56  except:
57  rospy.logerr("Failed to load model from torch hub")
58  rospy.logerr(traceback.format_exc())
59  exit()
60 
61  self.det_pub = rospy.Publisher(
62  pub_name, data_class=ObjectsInImg, queue_size=1)
63  self.color_img_sub = message_filters.Subscriber(img_color_top, data_class=Image)
64  self.depth_img_sub = message_filters.Subscriber(img_depth_top, data_class=Image)
65  self.camera_info = message_filters.Subscriber(camera_info_top, data_class=CameraInfo)
66  ts = message_filters.ApproximateTimeSynchronizer(
67  [self.color_img_sub, self.depth_img_sub, self.camera_info], 10, 0.01)
68  ts.registerCallback(self.detect_objects_in_img)
69 
70  def detect_objects_in_img(self, image_message, depth_message, camera_info_message):
71  """
72  This function is called when a new image is received.
73  It extracts the grape-bunch image positions from the image and publishes them.
74  """
75 
76  im = np.frombuffer(image_message.data, dtype=np.uint8).reshape(
77  image_message.height, image_message.width, -1)
78  objects = self.get_objects_in_img_from_detector(im)
79  df = None
80 
81  if objects is not None:
82  df = objects.pandas().xyxy[0]
83 
84  detections = self.serialise_detections_to_object_detected_msg(df)
85  object_in_img = self.serialise_detections_msgs_to_object_in_img_msg(
86  image_message, depth_message, camera_info_message, detections)
87  self.det_pub.publish(object_in_img)
88 
89  def serialise_detections_msgs_to_object_in_img_msg(self, image_message, depth_message, camera_info_message, detections):
90  """
91  Serialises the detections to an object_in_img message
92  @param detections: list of ObjectDetected messages
93  @return: ObjectsInImg message
94  @rtype: ObjectsInImg
95  """
96  if image_message is None or depth_message is None or camera_info_message is None or detections is None:
97  return ObjectsInImg()
98 
99  im_detection_msg = ObjectsInImg()
100  im_detection_msg.objects_detected = detections
101  im_detection_msg.camera_info_color = camera_info_message
102  im_detection_msg.im_color = image_message
103  im_detection_msg.im_depth = depth_message
104  return im_detection_msg
105 
106  def serialise_detections_to_object_detected_msg(self, df):
107  """
108  Serialises the detections to object_detected message.
109  @param df: pandas dataframe with detections
110  @return: ObjectDetected message
111  """
112  return [self.serialise_detection_to_object_detected_msg(detection) for index, detection in df.iterrows()]
113 
114  def serialise_detection_to_object_detected_msg(self, df):
115  """
116  Serialises the detection to an object_detected message.
117  @param df: pandas dataframe with detection
118  @return: ObjectDetected message
119  """
120 
121  if df.empty or df is None:
122  return ObjectDetected()
123 
124  df["xcenter"] = (df["xmax"] + df["xmin"])/2
125  df["ycenter"] = (df["ymax"] + df["ymin"])/2
126 
127  df["xsize"] = df["xmax"] - df["xmin"]
128  df["ysize"] = df["ymax"] - df["ymin"]
129 
130  object_detected_msg = ObjectDetected()
131  object_detected_msg.id = df["class"]
132  object_detected_msg.score = df["confidence"]
133  object_detected_msg.bbox = BoundingBox2D(
134  Pose2D(df["xcenter"], df["ycenter"], 0.), df["xsize"], df["ysize"])
135 
136  return object_detected_msg
137 
138  def get_objects_in_img_from_detector(self, img):
139  """
140  Extracts the grape-bunch image positions from the image.
141  @param img: image
142  @return: pandas dataframe with detections
143  """
144  if self.detector_model is not None:
145  object_detected = self.detector_model(img)
146  return object_detected
147  rospy.logdebug("Object detector model is not ready yet. WAITING...")
148  return []
149 
150 
151 if __name__ == "__main__":
152  try:
153  ObjectDetector()
154  rospy.spin()
155 
156  except Exception as e:
157  rospy.logerr(traceback.format_exc())
158  pass
